nodes.text: The Imperial Sourcebook, written by Greg Gorden, was released in October 1989 as part of the West End Games Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
A softbound edition of the sourcebook was released in November 1991, and a second edition was released in June 1994.
Includes all the game statistics needed to use the might of the Empire in the roleplaying game. 144-page book features:
Prologue: The Might of the Empire
Chapter One: A Primer on Imperial Power
Chapter Twelve: Recruitment, Training and Indoctrination
